text: Secrets is a 1983 British TV film directed by Gavin Millar and produced by David Puttnam. ==Production== Goldcrest Films invested £461,000 in the movie and received £620,000 earning them a profit of £159,000. ==References== ==External links== *Secrets at IMDb *Secrets at Goldcrest *Secrets at Letterbox DVD Category:1983 television films Category:1983 films Category:Films directed by Gavin Millar
title: Secrets (1983 film)
